item.title: Aggregate Functions in SQL — Party Time with Candy Counting!
item.description: Hey there, SQL enthusiast! Imagine you’re at a lively party with a bunch of friends, and there’s a big bowl of colorful candies on the table. Now, let’s say you want to figure out some cool stats about those candies: like the total number of candies, the average amount each friend has, or even which friend has a candy stash that puts everyone else to shame. Believe it or not, SQL has some powerful tools, called aggregate functions, that do just this kind of “candy counting” on data!
